footer.text1: Welcome to Valladolid, Yucatán, Mexico! Explore festivals, local events, and beautiful tourist spots that capture the spirit of this magical town. Whether you’re looking for history, adventure, or relaxation, Valladolid has something special waiting for you.
footer.text2: All Rights Reserved for the Municipality of Valladolid, Yucatán V: 1.6.2

historia.title: Meet Valladolid, Yucatán, Mexico
historia.subtitle: Learn about the history of Valladolid, Yucatan, México
